value.string:
from DateTime import DateTime
 b = DateTime().timeTime()
 BLACKLIST_RELATIVE_URL_LIST = (
 'accounting_module/template_sale_invoice_transaction',
 'open_sale_order_module/slapos_accounting_open_sale_order_line_template',
 'open_sale_order_module/slapos_accounting_open_sale_order_template',
 'sale_packing_list_module/slapos_accounting_instance_delivery_line_template',
 'sale_packing_list_module/slapos_accounting_instance_delivery_template',
 'sale_trade_condition_module/payzen_sale_trade_condition',
 'sale_trade_condition_module/slapos_aggregated_trade_condition',
 'sale_trade_condition_module/slapos_consumption_trade_condition',
 'sale_trade_condition_module/slapos_subscription_trade_condition',
 )
 portal = context.getPortalObject()
 module_list = (
 portal.accounting_module,
 portal.internal_packing_list_module,
 portal.open_sale_order_module,
 portal.portal_simulation,
 portal.purchase_packing_list_module,
 portal.sale_order_module,
 portal.sale_packing_list_module,
 portal.sale_trade_condition_module,
 )
 tag = script.id
 if bg:
 if portal.portal_activities.countMessageWithTag(tag) > 0:
 raise TypeError('Already running')
 for module in module_list:
 getattr(module.activate(tag=tag), '03_ERP5Site_deleteVifibAccounting')(bg=0)
 return 'Done.'
 
 deleted = False
 if context in module_list:
 id_list = [q.getId() for q in \
 portal.portal_catalog(parent_uid=context.getUid(), limit=100) if q.getRelativeUrl() not in BLACKLIST_RELATIVE_URL_LIST]
 if id_list:
 deleted = True
 context.deleteContent(id_list)
 e = DateTime().timeTime() - b
 script.log('Deleted %s from %s in %.3ss, so %.3s/s' % (len(id_list), context.getId(), e, len(id_list)/e))
 
 if deleted:
 getattr(context.activate(tag=tag), '03_ERP5Site_deleteVifibAccounting')(bg=0)
 else:
 script.log('Finished module %s' % context.getPath())
